      Constructor of the weather.
      Parameters:
      date - of the city
      main_weather - , a word to describe the weather
      description - a description of the weather
      humidity -
      clouds - , cloudiness
      wind_speed -
      wind_deg - wind degrees
      rain - volume
      snow - volume
      visibility -
      temp_current - , current temperature
      temp_feelslike - , temperature parameter for the human perception of weather
      pop_rain - , probaility of precipitation

    • createFromJSON

      public void createFromJSON(org.json.simple.JSONObject jobj, TimeZone offset)
      This method set the date of its own city and the other weather attributes.
      Specified by:
      createFromJSON in interface WeatherInterface
      Parameters:
      jobj - JSONObject to store the attributes.
      offset - TimeZone, the time offset of the city.
